snippet: Geno Smith, talking with reporters at a team event, said he looked forward to meeting Coach Todd Bowles and working under the new offensive coordinator, Chan Gailey.
abstract: NFL Roundup; New York Jets quarterback Geno Smith is gearing up for next season under new regime.
lead_paragraph: Geno Smith, talking with reporters at a team event, said he looked forward to meeting Coach Todd Bowles and working under the new offensive coordinator, Chan Gailey.

headline.main: To Jets’ Geno Smith, 2015 Isn’t His Last Chance, but It’s Vital
